hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that ##Zora's River## has #3# major items.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombchus (10 pieces)#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nut Capacity#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Green Rupee#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the way of the hero.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nut Capacity#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #the Market# is on the path to #the Key#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #the Market# is on the path to #the Key#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombchus (10 pieces)#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #the Song of Storms#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Light Trial Second Right Chest

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: If Gorons eat rocks, does that mean I'm in danger?

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that quest guidance can be found at a talking rock.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that the Zora's Domain #diving game and torch run# lead to...^ #the Hover Boots# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #collecting cuccos# rewards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that a #fractured desert wall# hides the #Lon Lon Tower#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that playing #Sun's Song# in a grave spawns #a Piece of Heart#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that the #rainbow bridge# leads to #the Fire Temple#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #the souls of Twinrova#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that lifting a #rock in the desert# reveals a #generic grotto#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #Ganon's Tower# is protected by a powerful barrier.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that racing #Dampé's ghost# rewards...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #a Red Rupee#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #at the Desert Colossus#, skulltulas at night hold...^ #a Red Rupee# and #the Mirror Shield#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that a #heavy pillar# outside the castle obstructs #Know-It-All Brothers' House#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that ##the Forest Temple## has #2# major items.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that Ganondorf will appear in the next Mario Tennis.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #the Prelude of Light#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that ##Zora's Fountain## has #4# major items.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that showing the #Mask of Truth in the Deku Theater# rewards #a Huge Rupee#.
